overview:
Brian Lim is a high tech entrepreneur and inventor.

Brian is one of the co-Founders of TripDibs, an innovative internet company that introduced option value to the travel industry. Prior to TripDibs, Brian founded Atomate and served as the company’s CEO and Chairman for 6 years.

Brian has been a VP of Engineering, Sales, Marketing, and Business Development at various startups that have been acquired by Sun, Cisco, and Veeco.

Prior to jumping in the startup world, Brian was the Product Manager of Java at Sun Microsystems and rocket scientist at NASA-JPL where he developed spacecraft hardware currently orbiting Saturn, Mars, and Earth.

Brian earned his MS/BS at MIT in Engineering and Management.
